plot: Murdock and Foggy take on the DA in the trial of the century, but their client refuses to play along. Murdock struggles to balance his dual identities.

Karen continues to counsel Frank, in jail this time. The firm's plan is to go with PTSD. Matt and Elektra decode the last page of the book. Busy with Elektra, Matt misses court, leaving it all on Foggy. Matt and Karen have their first argument. The firm lose a witness because of Elektra.—Andreea D
